custom-sql.sql: SELECT opencps_statistic.* FROM opencps_statistic WHERE (opencps_statistic.domainCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.reporting = ?) AND (opencps_statistic.groupId = ?)

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier WHERE (opencps_dossier.registerBookCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.processNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serviceCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.applicantIdType = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.applicantIdNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.cityCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.districtCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.wardCode = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.contactTelNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.contactEmail = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.delegateIdNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.delegateTelNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierSubStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierActionId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.viaPostal = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.online = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serverNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.originDossierId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.releaseDate IS NULL OR [$SPECIFY_RELEASE_DATE$]) AND (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?)
